actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to establish a national health program administered by the Office of Personnel Management to offer Federal employee health benefits plans to individuals who are not Federal employees, and for other purposes.
short_title: Offering People True Insurance Options Nationwide Act of 2000

summary.text: Offering People True Insurance Options Nationwide Act of 2000 - Directs the Office of Personnel Management to administer a health insurance program that offers Federal employees health benefits plans to individuals who are not Federal employees.

titles.title: Offering People True Insurance Options Nationwide Act of 2000

A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to establish a national health program administered by the Office of Personnel Management to offer Federal employee health benefits plans to individuals who are not Federal employees, and for other purposes.
